function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transporting virus-laden droplets with ductless PV system","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the built environment","Mitigation":"Restricting the use of the PV system by infected occupants and implementing additional air filtration or purification methods","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) systems","People":"Occupants, visitors, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance team"},{"Description":"Increased re-suspension of virus-laden particles due to desk or ceiling fans","Impact":"Enhanced circulation and distribution of contagious particles within the room","Mitigation":"Consideration of airflow patterns and strategic placement of fans to minimize re-suspension, use of air purifiers to capture re-suspended particles","Technologies":"Airflow sensors, air purifiers","People":"Occupants, visitors, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance team"},{"Description":"Risk of increased rates of deposition of virus-laden particles due to fan usage","Impact":"Accumulation of virus-laden particles within the room","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of fans, use of air purifiers to capture deposited particles","Technologies":"Air purifiers, cleaning equipment","People":"Occupants, visitors, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance team"}]}
